rollback.screen.text.name: Name (Optional):
rollback.screen.narrator.backup.rollback: Selected rollback %d, named: "%s", created: %s, day: %s, size: %s
rollback.screen.narrator.backup.backup.n: Selected backup %d, named: "%s", created: %s, day: %s, size: %s
rollback.confirm.title.rollback.rollback: Are you sure you want to rollback?
rollback.confirm.title.rollback.backup: Are you sure you want to rollback to this backup?
rollback.confirm.info.rollback: Any not backed up progress will be lost!
rollback.confirm.title.delete.rollback: Are you sure you want to delete this rollback?
rollback.confirm.title.delete.backup: Are you sure you want to delete this backup?
rollback.confirm.title.saveAsDefault: Are you sure you want to save this config as default?
rollback.confirm.info.saveAsDefault: This action might affect other worlds as well!
rollback.confirm.title.backupLimit: You have created %d backups! (Total file size of %s)
rollback.confirm.info.backupLimit.1:
Backups will start to get automatically deleted
once you have more than %d of them.
rollback.confirm.info.backupLimit.2: Please consider deleting/converting some of them.
rollback.confirm.title.incompatibleVersi: You and the server are using incompatible versions!
rollback.confirm.info.incompatibleVersio: Please update the mod on your client and the server.
rollback.mehrad-config.description.backu: If enabled, the mod creates automated backups at the defined intervals.
rollback.mehrad-config.description.maxBa: Maximum number of automated backups to keep per world.
rollback.mehrad-config.description.backu: Number of minecraft days (20 minutes) that should pass to create an automated backup.
rollback.mehrad-config.description.timer: The automated backup timer is based on this.
rollback.mehrad-config.description.repla: If enabled, the "re-create" button in the Select World Screen gets replaced with a "rollback" button.
rollback.mehrad-config.description.promp: If enabled, the game will suggest you to enable Automated Backups for single-player worlds.
rollback.mehrad-config.description.comma: If set to always, you can access the mod in single-player worlds without enabling cheats.
